sentences.chinese: 豐富的馬籠頭皮革飾邊。

sentences.english: Change to a long electrode bridle.

sentences.english: Don ' t forget -font saddles and bridles!
sentences.chinese: 別忘了你的馬鞍和馬籠頭。

sentences.english: Water is dripping from that leaky faucet.
sentences.chinese: 水正從漏水的籠頭滴下來。

sentences.english: Fill in the bridle with silicone.

sentences.english: He harnessed the horse to a wagon.

sentences.english: Another type of collar that may be effective is a halter collar.

sentences.english: Lay the chain over the top of the noseband of the halter.
sentences.chinese: 把鏈子放在籠頭鼻革的上方。

sentences.english: A horse should NEVER be tied with a chain.
sentences.chinese: 絕對不要用籠頭鏈來栓馬。

sentences.english: Attach the snap to the upper halter ring on the off side.
sentences.chinese: 把扣索扣在外側位於稍上方的籠頭環。

sentences.english: This design has innovatively taken as a whole the traditional bridle and the rotatable subs.

sentences.english: Your horse has been haltered up.

sentences.chinese: 從不栓馬籠頭，也不可栓繮或短距離拴馬。
